info.name: AI Brand Analysis - Generate Questions
info.description: Test the questions generation API with 7 personas and 10 topics

topics.name: Development Quality Perception
topics.description: Consumer opinions on the quality, reliability, and functionality of websites developed by Lovable

topics.name: Pricing Competitiveness Analysis
topics.description: Consumer perceptions of Lovable's web development pricing in comparison to industry standards and competitors

topics.name: Customer Support Experience
topics.description: Consumer experiences and satisfaction with Lovable's customer support during and after web development projects

topics.name: Trust and Credibility Assessment
topics.description: Consumer perceptions of Lovable's trustworthiness, professionalism, and expertise in web development

topics.name: Innovation and Trend Adoption
topics.description: Consumer opinions on Lovable's adoption and integration of the latest web development trends and technologies

topics.name: Project Timeline Satisfaction
topics.description: Consumer satisfaction with the timelines and deadlines set by Lovable for web development projects

topics.name: Communication Effectiveness
topics.description: Consumer experiences with Lovable's communication style, transparency, and responsiveness during web development projects

topics.name: Design and User Experience
topics.description: Consumer opinions on the aesthetic and functional design of websites developed by Lovable

topics.name: Post Launch Support Evaluation
topics.description: Consumer experiences with Lovable's support and maintenance services after the launch of a web development project

topics.name: Overall Satisfaction and Loyalty
topics.description: Consumer overall satisfaction with Lovable's web development services and their likelihood to recommend or return for future projects

personas.name: Tech Savvy Entrepreneur
personas.description: Ambitious entrepreneurs who need high-quality web development services to launch and grow their online businesses, with a focus on innovation, scalability, and user experience

personas.name: Design-Conscious Business
personas.description: Established businesses that prioritize design and user experience in their web development projects, seeking to enhance their brand image and customer engagement
painPoints: Poor design quality from previous developers

personas.name: Budget-Focused Startup
personas.description: Early-stage startups with limited budgets, seeking affordable web development services that meet their basic needs and provide a foundation for future growth

personas.name: E-commerce Store Owner
personas.description: E-commerce store owners who require web development services to create or improve their online stores, with a focus on functionality, security, and user experience

personas.name: Marketing Agency Partner
personas.description: Marketing agencies that partner with web development companies to offer comprehensive services to their clients, seeking reliable and high-quality development services

personas.name: Small Business Owner
personas.description: Small business owners who need web development services to establish or improve their online presence, with a focus on simplicity, affordability, and ease of use

personas.name: Enterprise IT Manager
personas.description: IT managers in large enterprises who oversee web development projects, seeking high-quality, scalable, and secure solutions that meet their organization's complex needs
